WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 17 FEB
   BY M/V PIAUI XV TOWING 10000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   04-42S 035-07W, 04-38S 036-31W,
   03-42S 038-28W, 03-38S 038-28W,
   03-46S 035-59W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 18 FEB 17.
